conversation.content: Welcome to my little shop! Please, sit down and ask me your questions about the future. What would you like to know about technology?
What will phones be like in the future?

In the future, phones will be very different from the ones we have now. They will be smaller, thinner, and more powerful. They will also be able to do many things that we can't even imagine now, like read our minds and talk to us in different languages.
It means that phones will be able to understand what we're thinking and talk to us in our own language, even if we don't speak the same language as the person on the other end.
Wow, that's amazing! Will they still have screens?

In the future, phones will have special displays that are like windows into other worlds. They will be able to show us things that are happening far away, like a video call from someone on the other side of the world, and they will be able to show us information in a way that's easy to understand, like a 3D map of the city.
That's really interesting! Will we still need to touch them?

No, you won't need to touch them. They will be able to read your voice and your movements, so you can control them with just your voice and gestures. That's why they will be even more convenient and easy to use.
